component.name: Elmer
component.summary: Free and open source multiphysical simulation software

description.p: Elmer is computational tool for multi-physics problems. Elmer includes physical models of fluid dynamics, structural mechanics, electromagnetics, heat transfer and acoustics, for example. These are described by partial differential equations which Elmer solves by the Finite Element Method (FEM).
